title: Reggae Bubblers - Black Star Liner Featuring Virgin Island Artis
description:
1 Praise To The Rasta featuring Cheech
2 Lift Your Head featuring Hayba
3 Jah Will Ensure featuring Ras Ika
4 Guidance featuring Heavenly Peterson
5 Problem featuring Xkaliba
6 Information featuring Jordon
7 People Get Ready featuring Meeko Diamond
8 Children In The Ghetto featuring Hayba
9 Inna My Resident featuring Aaron Bull
10 Afrika featuring Cheech
11 Afrika Dub featuring Reggae Bubblers


The Reggae Bubblers is a Conscious Roots Reggae band out of St. Croix, Virgin Islands. The band has been in existence since 2001. The Bubblers have produced 8 CDs ÃƒÂ¢?? 2 Calypso and 6 Reggae ÃƒÂ¢?? and a ninth is to be released in mid-2006.

The first CD ÃƒÂ¢?? ÃƒÂ¢??De Bubble BurstÃƒÂ¢?? ÃƒÂ¢?? released in 2003 was a single with 2 Reggae songs (Jah Love and Freedom). 

The second and third CDs ÃƒÂ¢?? ÃƒÂ¢??Bubblers Wild SideÃƒÂ¢?? and ÃƒÂ¢??BubbliciousÃƒÂ¢?? - showed off The Bubblers Soca and Calypso side. 

The fourth CD titled ÃƒÂ¢??Give a Little LoveÃƒÂ¢?? featuring Cheech and Hayba, is a 13 song Reggae CD released in 2004. 

The fifth CD, ÃƒÂ¢??Hills and ValleysÃƒÂ¢??, has 14 Reggae songs and was released in 2005. 

The sixth and seventh CDs titled ÃƒÂ¢??Black Star Liner Vol. IÃƒÂ¢?? and ÃƒÂ¢??Black Star Liner Vol. IIÃƒÂ¢?? are compilation Reggae CDs. These CDs feature some of the Conscious Roots Artists from St. Croix and the Virgin Islands, such as Ikahba, Xkaliba, Aaron Bull, Jordan, Meko Diamond, Heavenly Petersen, Jr. P., Massiah, Imo, Shadow, Sekhu, Revolution, Volcano, and 2 members of The Reggae Bubblers, Cheech and Hayba. All artists are backed up by the rhythms of The Reggae Bubblers. 

The eighth CD is "Live on Assignment". This is a live version of many of The Reggae Bubblers hits. This was released early 2006. 

And soon to be released in mid-2006 is the "Black Star Liner Vol. 3". Another compilation CD featuring various Virgin Island Artists.

The Reggae Bubblers is a Roots and Culture band whose Consciousness stems from their faith in Rastafari, Haile Selassie Ist as their Light, Guide, and Salvation! Rastafari is the way! This is the Strength and Inspiration to the BubblersÃƒÂ¢?? music, which is the kingÃƒÂ¢??s music. The sound wave is Positive Vibration and the Feeling is that of Serenity, Rastafari.
